1.content:
You and Daryl were sitting at the top of one of the jail's towers, looking out over the prison yard and making sure that the ground didn't get overrun by walkers or impostors. The two of you had a love/hate relationship and today was one of the days that you'd gotten on his nerves, and he on yours. So you sat in silence, not even looking over at the redneck beside you until he began to speak.

"Moon's bright," he pointed out and you nodded.

"Sure is."

Hell, it mind as well be daytime."

"I think you're being a little dramatic." Daryl look at you.

"What'd ya call me?"

"Dramatic," you repeated, not bothering to look his way. He huffed and looked back across the field, pushing himself standing. You glanced at him out of the corner of your eye. "Where are you going?"

"Don't worry, sunshine," he answered gruffly, "I'll be right back."

You rolled your eyes as he walked away and you enjoyed the still of the silence until his shoes could be heard against the rungs of the ladder. You sighed as he appeared in the tower again, holding Rick's handcuffs in his hand. You frowned as he walked to you and crouched down.

"What the hell do you have those for?"

"I think it's time ya learned not ta call people names," was all he said as he slapped a cuff on your wrist, yanked it back against the railing and pulled your other hand up beside it so he could cuff them together. your arms were stuck above your head when he released you and you yanked down, trying to get free. you glared at him.

"Let me go." He shook his head, taking a seat in front of you.

"Not until ya learn ta watch yer mouth."

You gasped when Daryl's hands shout out towards your...
1.title: You're Being Dramatic

11.content:
Daryl slid your boots off in one fluid motion and you tried yanking them back but he had an arm wrapped around your ankles, holding them in place.

"Daryl, don't!" you said but he ignored you as his fingers began to trace light patterns on the bottoms of your feet. You gasped and clamped your mouth shut, refusing to give him the reaction he wanted as he smirked at you. He dragged a finger up from your heel to the base of your toes and a giggle escaped your lips.

"What's that I hear?" he said, "was that a laugh?" You shook your head as your cheeks turned red, partly from embarrassment and partly from holding your laughter in.

"Hmm. Guess I'll have ta try somethin' different."

So he moved to your...
11.title: Feet

choices: Rick came out to see what the commotion was
12.content:
You screamed as his fingers made contact with your stomach and he shushed you immediately.

"Do ya want the others ta come out here?" he asked, tickling around your belly button. he slipped his hands beneath your shirt and dipped a finger inside, making you arch your back and belt out laughter. He chuckled as he pulled his finger out and began letting all ten dance across your skin again.

"Stahap!" you begged, shaking your head with your eyes shut tight.

"Not until ya learn your lesson."

All you could do was laugh as...
12.title: Stomach

choices: Told Daryl to let you go
121.content:
"What's going on out here?" came a voice by the door that you recognize immediately as Rick's.

"Rihick!" you laughed, "please help me!" Daryl looked back at him as you begged.

"She's been callin' me names," he explained and Rick took a step closer, crouching down in front of you.

"Has she now?"

"Yup, feel free to join in if ya want." Daryl continued tickling your stomach as Rick watched, considering what to do next. After a few seconds of contemplation, he...

13.content:
Daryl reached out and tweaked your side, making you jump violently. Noting your reaction, he squeezed again and you kicked at him.

"Stop!"

"Callin' me names and now kickin' at me, huh?" he said and your heart dropped at the tone in his voice.

"Daryl, please don't tickle me."

"Sorry, sunshine, you brought this on yerself."

"No wait, I'm sohorry!" you giggled as he latched his hands onto your sides and began to dig his thumbs in just below your ribs. You threw your head back against the metal bar and tried to twist your body away but he turned you back so you were facing him.

"Where do ya think yer going?"

He started tickling you again and...
